title: 音乐节奏灯
story: 能源站挑战：创建跟随音乐节拍的LED效果。

starter.code:
# TODO: 创建节拍感LED序列
# 模拟音乐节拍：强-弱-次强-弱

solution:
def beat_pattern():
    # 强拍
    for i in range(4):
        print(f'on{i}')
    print('wait200')
    # 弱拍
    print('on0')
    print('wait100')
    print('off0')
    # 次强拍
    for i in range(2):
        print(f'on{i}')
    print('wait150')
    # 弱拍
    print('on3')
    print('wait100')

beat_pattern()
